meanings.definition: A group of principal female dancers in a ballet company.
meanings.sent1: The coryphees gracefully twirled across the stage.
meanings.sent2: The coryphees received a standing ovation for their performance.
meanings.sent3: The coryphees decided to have a dance-off for fun.
meanings.sent4: Her movements were as elegant as a coryphees on stage.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of the coryphees' dance left the audience in awe.

meanings.definition: The leading performers in a particular field or activity.
meanings.sent1: In the world of music, she was considered one of the coryphees.
meanings.sent2: The coryphees of science gathered for a prestigious conference.
meanings.sent3: The coryphees of cooking challenged each other to a cook-off.
meanings.sent4: His skills on the basketball court made him a coryphees among his peers.
meanings.sent5: The coryphees of literature were celebrated for their contributions to the art.
